alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Candler; Evans; Inland Bryan; Tattnall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, EVANS, BULLOCH, CANDLER AND TATTNALL COUNTIES... At 650 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Collins, or 9 miles north of Reidsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Claxton, Hagan, Collins, Cobbtown, Daisy, Nevils, Denmark and Groveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify. Be certain to monitor local radio and TV stations as well as local cable TV outlets for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bulloch; Candler; Evans; Inland Bryan; Tattnall
